methods.name: GetAudioComponent
methods.comment: Get the audio component you want

methods.name: GetAmbientSettings
methods.comment: Get the ambient settings of this volume

methods.name: GetAdditionalAttunationDistance
methods.comment: Extra distance to start playing audio outside the attenuation radius

methods.name: AddVolume
methods.comment: Adds to volume to the world

methods.name: RemoveVolume
methods.comment: Adds to volume to the world

properties.name: mAudioComponent
properties.comment: The audio component we want to move around

properties.name: mAdditionalAttenuationDistance
properties.comment: How much further away than the attenuation distance do we want to start playing the ambient OnGeCloseSound

properties.name: mCachedBoxSphereBounds
properties.comment: Caching the extent for use later

properties.name: mIsCameraClose
properties.comment: if set, then the camera is within/close to the attenuation range of the sound

properties.name: mIsCameraInside
properties.comment: if set, the the camera is inside the volume

properties.name: mIsSignificant
properties.comment: Is this volume in significance range

properties.name: mSignificanceRange
properties.comment: Range that this volume should be significant within
